game.name: Construction Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Construction Simulator가 그 어느 때보다 더 크고 인상적인 모습으로 돌아왔습니다! 헤이프의 도움을 받아 사업을 처음부터 시작하며 성공적인 건설 사업가로 성장하는 야망을 이루세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Construction Simulator has returned – larger and more impressive than ever! Fulfil your ambition to become a successful construction entrepreneur by establishing your business from scratch, assisted by your mentor Hape.

reviewHighlights.text: After 13 hour shift working in construction, i get home excited just to play this. Reccomended, 10/10
I hate to say it but the game is very worth it. Playing by yourself is nice but get some friends in your game and its 10x better!
